title: Cilent chat broken
body:
The in client chat is broken for me. It cant be interacted with, I cant type or receive messages. The chat window wont go away so im unable to change masteries /runes or choose a hero from the bottom left.

I have tried relogging, and repairing the client but neither fix the problem.  Hero select chat also doesn't work. In game chat however is working normally

replies.body: Done all of that and it doesn't change anything.

Try running through the steps in the Connection Troubleshooting Guide:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If that doesn't resolve the problem then likely it's a client issue and you should try running a repair. You should set up your permissions before doing so in case it's what caused the bad patch in the first place:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions
Have a same issue here as well. Could not choose summoner spells and chat in champ select.
